title: You Are In Love (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:22.96] One look, dark room
[00:25.90] Meant just for you
[00:28.39] Time moved too fast
[00:31.56] You play it back
[00:34.58] Buttons on a coat
[00:37.09] Lighthearted joke
[00:40.05] No proof, not much
[00:42.64] But you saw enough
[00:45.74] Small talk, he drives
[00:48.44] Coffee at midnight
[00:51.44] The light reflects
[00:54.18] The chain on your neck
[00:57.14] He says, "Look up"
[00:59.81] And your shoulders brush
[01:02.67] No proof, one touch
[01:05.32] But you felt enough
[01:07.92] You can hear it in the silence (silence), silence (silence), you
[01:13.75] You can feel it on the way home (way home), way home (way home), you
[01:19.46] You can see it with the lights out (lights out), lights out (lights out)
[01:23.57] You are in love
[01:26.59] True love
[01:29.18] You are in love
[01:32.43] 
[01:36.62] Morning, his place
[01:39.32] Burnt toast, Sunday
[01:42.28] You keep his shirt
[01:45.08] He keeps his word
[01:47.50] And for once, you let go
[01:50.40] Of your fears and your ghosts
[01:53.56] One step, not much
[01:56.13] But it said enough
[01:59.26] You kiss on sidewalks
[02:01.82] You fight, then you talk
[02:04.85] One night, he wakes
[02:07.15] Strange look on his face
[02:10.58] Pauses, then says
[02:12.87] "You're my best friend"
[02:15.86] And you knew what it was
[02:18.98] He is in love
[02:21.56] You can hear it in the silence (silence), silence (silence), you
[02:27.32] You can feel it on the way home (way home), way home (way home), you
[02:32.61] You can see it with the lights out (lights out), lights out (lights out)
[02:37.16] You are in love
[02:39.94] True love
[02:42.58] You are in love
[02:43.26] And so it goes
[02:44.59] You two are dancing in a snow globe 'round and 'round
[02:49.72] And he keeps a picture of you in his office downtown
[02:55.48] And you understand now why they lost their minds and fought the wars
[03:01.03] And why I've spent my whole life trying to put it into words
[03:06.88] 'Cause you can hear it in the silence
[03:12.15] You can feel it on the way home
[03:15.78] 
[03:18.23] You can see it with the lights out
[03:22.17] You are in love
[03:25.27] True love
[03:28.15] You are in love

[03:34.86] You can feel it on the way home (way home), way home (way home), you
[03:40.65] You can see it with the lights out (lights out), lights out (lights out)
[03:44.96] You are in love
[03:47.72] True love
[03:50.49] You are in love
[03:52.03] You can hear it in the silence (silence), silence (silence), you
[03:57.75] You can feel it on the way home (way home), way home (way home), you
[04:03.54] You can see it with the lights out (lights out), lights out (lights out)
[04:07.28] You are in love
